name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: nwtn - The copilot for the web

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ask anything in any website. 10x your productivity.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
nwtn, your ultimate web assistant. Transform the way you interact with the internet, making it more intuitive, efficient, and insightful.


Features:

▲ Interactive Web Experience: With nwtn, the web is no longer a one-way street. Ask questions directly on any webpage and get immediate, accurate responses. Say goodbye to countless tabs and hello to streamlined browsing.

▲ Knowledge at Your Fingertips: Why just read when you can converse? Engage in a dialogue with any website, extracting key insights and understanding complex information faster than ever before.

▲ Effortless Learning: Cut through the noise and focus on what matters. Whether it's technical documents, lengthy articles, or troubleshooting guides, nwtn helps you digest information 10x faster.

▲ Multi-Document Analysis: Bring together information from multiple documents in one chat. Compare, contrast, and get a holistic view of any topic.

▲ Fact-Based Responses: No more guesswork. nwtn provides factual answers, ensuring you have reliable information at all times.


Join the ranks of professionals who have revolutionized their web experience with nwtn. It's not just an extension, it's a productivity powerhouse. Install nwtn today and experience the future of web browsing!
